channel.title: Arise PvP - A Phoenix Continuation
channel.description:
[center][img]https://db.tt/Hw5hK35S[/img] [/center] The base I am using is Phoenix by Vix. I chose this base because I felt it represented exactly what I wanted in a server. The attribute system is used throughout the entire server and will continue to be used throughout this project. [b]This project will be released for download upon completion. [/b]There may or may not be several versions of this project.
[b]Media:[/b] [img]http://puu.sh/6DwA9.png[/img] Added base for combat; hit-updates; entity death.

item.title: Arise PvP - A Phoenix Continuation
item.dc:creator: @wavemaker wavemaker
item.description:
@wavemaker wrote:

Vix:

Looks great! If you need any type of assistance feel free to shoot me a message.

Thanks for the support, and I will!

So there hasn’t been too much updates as of lately. I have been looking at different ways to handle weapon definitions. I have come to the conclusion of making a tool that would allow people to edit a .dat file that would contain all the different weapon information. I think this would be beneficial because I had to ask myself, “how many times are you actually going to edit weapon animations, bonuses, special animations, etc.”. You’re probably not going to be changing them at all. This tool will also be released upon it’s completion.

Edit: For those interested

Read full topic
